TRANSACTION.TITLE: 4700 理财产品信息维护

ITEM.FUNCTIONS: T(4700 理财产品信息维护)

PAGE.NAME: DEFAULT
PAGE.BLOCK:
<ITEM  TYPE="%-20s"  NAME="#FDBL" INPUT="TEXT" "/>
  <ITEM  TYPE="%-20s"  NAME="#FDBLA" INPUT="TEXT" "/>
  <ITEM  TYPE="%-20s"  NAME="#FDBLB" INPUT="TEXT" "/>
  <ITEM  TYPE="%-20s"  NAME="#FDBLC" INPUT="TEXT" "/>
  <ITEM  TYPE="%-20s"  NAME="#FDBLD" INPUT="TEXT" "/>
  

    
	  "{
	  	    dim @tota as string;
	        initfd();
	        commsend_001();
	  	    $FD16='8018';
	  	    $FD62=#CPDM;
	  	    $FD65='0001';	  	
	  	    @tota=callserver();
	  	    if($FD12 != '0000')
	  	    {
	  		     showmsg(geterror());
	  		     return(false);
	  	    }
	        #CPMC = delspace($FD25);
	        #CPLX =  $FD67;
	        
	        if(#CPLX == '2')
	        {
	        	#SH=$FD99;
	        	
	        }
	        #SYLX =  $FD68;
	        #MJQSR=  $FD44;
	        #MJJSR=  $FD45;
	        #CPQXR=  $FD46;
	        #CPDQR=  $FD47;
	        #BZ   =  $FD21;
	        #KHLX =  $FD70;
	        #FXDJ =  $FD69;
	        #TZFX =  $FD72;
	        #FDLV =  $FD71;
	        #YQSYL=  val($FD84,0.000001);
	        #FSZE =  val($FD39,0.01);
	        #GRZDE=  val($FD41,0.01);
	        #DGZDE=  val($FD42,0.01);
	        #DZJE =  val(substr($FD100,16,16),0.01);
	        #CPMJ =  val(substr($FD100,32,16),0.01);
          #YXCX =  $FD93;
          #STAT =  $FD66;
          showmsg('#STAT'+#STAT);
          if(#STAT!='0')
          {showmsg('该产品非募集期，不可维护！');
							return(false);
          }
          #DWZH=$FD31     ;//单位募集账户
          #GRZH=$FD32    ;//个人募集账户
          #QSZH=$FD33 ;//理财清算账号
          #TDJE= val($FD40,0.01);//梯度回显部分20140701
          #TDJEA=val(substr($FD101,28,16),0.01);//浮动回显开始20140701
          #TDJEB=val(substr($FD15,49,16),0.01);
          #TDJEC=val(substr($FD100,48,16),0.01);
          #TDJED=val(substr($FD15,65,16),0.01);
          #FDBL=$FD64;
        
          #FDBLA=$FD34;      
          #FDBLB=$FD35;       
          #FDBLC=$FD36;    
          #FDBLD=$FD48;         
      
          #YQSYL1 = #YQSYL*(val(#FDBL,0.01)+1);
          #YQSYL2 = #YQSYL*(val(#FDBLA,0.01)+1);
          #YQSYL3 = #YQSYL*(val(#FDBLB,0.01)+1);
          #YQSYL4 = #YQSYL*(val(#FDBLC,0.01)+1);
          #YQSYL5 = #YQSYL*(val(#FDBLD,0.01)+1);
          
          if(val(#FDBL,0.01) == 0.00)
          #YQSYL1 = 0.00;
          if(val(#FDBLA,0.01) == 0.00)
          #YQSYL2 = 0.00;
          if(val(#FDBLB,0.01) == 0.00)
          #YQSYL3 = 0.00;
          if(val(#FDBLC,0.01) == 0.00)
          #YQSYL4 = 0.00;
          if(val(#FDBLD,0.01) == 0.00)
          #YQSYL5 = 0.00;
          
         // enable(#FSZE,false);
	  }"
    
  
  
  

  <ITEM NAME="#CPLX"   DEVICE="KEYBOARD  NPUT="SELECT" LINE="2"   COL="15" TYPE="%-1s" FUNCTIONS="">
  
        
        
    
     
    "
   	{
   	if(#CPLX=='1')
   	{#SH='N';
   	enable(#SH,false);
   	 
   	}
   	else if(#CPLX=='2')
    {enable(#SH,true); 
    #SH='Y';
    
   	}  	
   	}"
   	
   	
   
   

  

  
        
        
        
    
   
   

  
  
  
  
  
 
   "{
           dim @cnt as number;
           if(#CPQXR<#MJJSR)
           {
               showmsg('起息日不能小于募集结束日!');
               return(false);
           }

      }"
      
  
	
  
  
  
        
        
    
   
   
  
  
  

  
        
    
   
  

  
        
        
        
    
   
   

  

  
        
        
        
        
        
    
   
  

  
        
        
        
        
        
        
        
    
   
  

  

    

  
        
        
   
   "
   	{
   	if(#FDLV=='N')
   	{enable(#TDJE,false);
    enable(#YQSYL1,false);
   	show(#TDJE,false);
   	show(#YQSYL1,false);
   	}
   	else if(#FDLV=='Y')
    {enable(#TDJE,true);
    enable(#YQSYL1,true);
   	show(#TDJE,true);
   	show(#YQSYL1,true);
   	}
   	
   	}"
   	
   
  
  

    "{
  	if(#FSZE < #CPMJ){
  	showmsg('最低募集金额不能大于发售总额');
  	return(false);
  	}
  	}"
  	
  		
  

  

  

  

  

  

  
        
        
    
   

   

   	
   

   


      

     
      "{
           if(#FDLV=='N')
          {
            show(#COMP,true);
              show(#NT_PAGE,false);
          }
          else if(#FDLV=='Y')
           { show(#NT_PAGE,true);
            show(#COMP,false);
          }
        }"

ITEM.NAME: #TDJEA
#TDJEB
#TDJEC
#TDJED

PACKAGE.DESC: 请打印理财产品明细凭证
